contexts.context: ...all the Guar scuttled off towards the sea, determined to <mark>drown</mark> themselves rather than live in such a continual state of fear...
...predicted the storm? Who could have predicted that everyone would <mark>drown</mark>, from the bold captain to the mysterious figure with ties...
...water, until Horis could hold his breath no more and <mark>drowned</mark>. Baranat pulled himself out of the river and continued down...
